long_description: The all-conditions REI Radiant Sleeping Bag features water-repellent down and lots of comfortable touches; the Radiant Plus Sleeping Bag is sized to fit bigger and taller backpackers. With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 19degF, this bag is suitable for 3-season use. Water-repellent 600-fill-power duck down offers excellent loft and warmth. Ripstop nylon shell also features a durable water repellent finish to further protect the down fill. Relaxed shoulder-to-hip fit is comfortable for multi-position sleepers. Contoured hood, insulated face muffler and full-length draft tube all work to keep warmth in. Differentiated hood and neck drawcords simplify adjustments; antisnag zipper works smoothly. Zip outer chest pocket is handy to stow essentials. Pad loops let you strap the bag to your sleeping pad (straps and pad not included). Any REI backpacking bag can be zipped to any other REI backpacking bag; women's bags zip on the right, unisex on the left. The REI Radiant Sleeping Bag includes a nylon stuff sack and a large cotton storage bag. EN is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
